body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #21330 (Deal with missing data in signature hashes more consistently by sipa)
* #21329 (descriptor wallet: Cache last hardened xpub and use in normalized descriptors by achow101)
* #21279 (scripted-diff: Regenerate key_io data deterministically by MarcoFalke)
* #21246 (doc: Correction for VerifyTaprootCommitment comments by roconnor-blockstream)
* #21238 (A few descriptor improvements to prepare for Taproot support by sipa)
* #21207 (MOVEONLY: CWallet transaction code out of wallet.cpp/.h by ryanofsky)
* #21206 (refactor: Make CWalletTx sync state type-safe by ryanofsky)
* #21166 (Have SignatureExtractorChecker subclass MutableTransactionSignatureChecker by achow101)
* #21158 (lib: Add Taproot support to libconsensus by jrawsthorne)
* #20861 (BIP 350: Implement Bech32m and use it for v1+ segwit addresses by sipa)
* #16116 (Avoid unnecessary signing provider copies on descriptor expansion by Empact)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->
ð This pull request conflicts with the target branch and [needs rebase](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#rebasing-changes).

<sub>Want to unsubscribe from rebase notifications on this pull request? Just convert this pull request to a "draft".</sub>
